channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Restricted Site Access
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Restricted Site Access

item.title: CVE-2022-1613|2024-08-03T00:10:03.795Z -- unknown -- restricted%20site%20access
item.description: The Restricted Site Access WordPress plugin before 7.3.2 prioritizes getting a visitor's IP from certain HTTP headers over PHP's REMOTE_ADDR, which makes it possible to bypass IP-based limitations in certain situations.
